statement.p: Find the area of a parallelogram formed by the vectors \displaystyle\vec{{{P}{Q}}} and \displaystyle\vec{{{P}{R}}}, where \displaystyle{P}={\left({3},{6},{0}\right)}, \displaystyle{Q}={\left(-{5},{2},{6}\right)} and \displaystyle{R}={\left(-{4},{3},{0}\right)}.
Give your answer to the nearest 0.01.
